snippet: The vote keeps the gas line, which Gov. Chris Christie’s government had lobbied for, out of the fragile area.
abstract: New Jersey Pinelands Commission, agency charged with protecting fragile ecological expanse, narrowly defeats proposal to run natural gas pipeline through it; decision deals blow to Gov Chris Christie, who argued for importance of pipeline to southern New Jersey's economic development.
lead_paragraph: The vote keeps the gas line, which Gov. Chris Christie’s government had lobbied for, out of the fragile area.

headline.main: Panel Blocks Gas Pipeline in New Jersey Pinelands
headline.print_headline: Panel Blocks Gas Pipeline Near Aquifer In New Jersey
